survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Meeting Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the hybrid meeting tools used within the organization, identifying strengths and areas for improvement to enhance remote and in-office collaboration.

questions.question_text: How often do you use hybrid meeting tools (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet) for work-related meetings?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to assess tool engagement. Ensure options cover all potential usage patterns.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize option order if possible to reduce bias.
